Articles.Content:
This is a continuation of A Return to Roving, wherein I dispatch some PUPs (Portable Upmoving Prospectors) to explore Eve and Gilly.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I'm really starting to think there are limits to this Segway-like rover concept
and how are you going to get back from eve?

and how are you going to get back from eve?

Well, when things work out, I don't really worry about it, I just let the PUPs wander (Mun, Minmus), or the DAWGs if the PUPs were bad (Duna, Ike). I haven't decided whether to try again to build an Eve-worthy rover, or rescue my Kerbals and be done with it. Silly planet.
